content.query:
DROP TABLE Kiabi.Product
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'Product' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE Kiabi.Product
	(
	 sku_id varchar(30),
	 style_id varchar(30),
	 pdm_style_id varchar(30),
	 color_id varchar(30),
	 size_id varchar(30),
	 pdt_class_id varchar(30),
	 glt_type_id varchar(30),
	 type_evenement varchar(30),
	 date_integration bigint,
	 date_evenement bigint
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH(sku_id),
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹                 
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_ProductH
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO Kiabi.Product
(sku_id 1, style_id 2, pdm_style_id 3, color_id 4, size_id 5, pdt_class_id 6, glt_type_id 7, type_evenement 8, date_integration 9, date_evenement 10)
FROM 'https://datalakekiabi1.dfs.core.windows.net/poc/prd/data/public/stocks/predictix/product/product/'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'PARQUET'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,COMPRESSION = 'snappy'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM Kiabi.Product
GO
